page.title: 05RECREATION.BILSDALE BAND.
page.content: Bilsdale Silver band is round about 100 years old.Mr Brotton of South Veiw Chop Gate has been a member for 25 years,since then there's been a lot of changes.When he started the band there were no girls but throughout the years the number of girls increased. Mr Brottons grandfather was a band master for 25 years,his name was William Garbutt he lived in Fangdale Beck and had a band practice every Sunday. His instrument was solo cornet. The lowest the band has ever got is 6 or 7 and the highest it has ever got is 26.At the moment the number of children in the band is quite a lot infact there's just about more children than adults. Mr William Wood of Spout House taught Mr Brotton to play the big E Flat base.At the moment is really good and I think he will be good for a long time to come.
